description: Erection of a drop kerb crossover at front driveway.
decision_conditions: The applicant has failed to demonstrate through the submission of cogent information that the proposed vehicular crossover would not have an adverse impact on highway safety. The proposal is therefore contrary to Paragraph 111 of the NPPF, 2023 and Policies DM9 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant has failed to demonstrate through the submission of cogent evidence that the proposed vehicular crossover would not harm the health and longevity of the immediately adjacent street trees, which would have an unacceptable adverse impact on the quality of the public realm within Lingfield Avenue and the character and appearance of the street and the wider area, thereby conflicting with Paragraph 131 of the National Planning Policy Framework 2023, Policy DM10 of the Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames Local Development Framework Core Strategy 2012, Policy G7 of the London Plan 2021 and guidance in the Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames Residential Design Guide SPD 2013.
